definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Attapulgite clay presented better adsorption capability than bentonite.
sentences.chinese: 凹土的吸附脱色性能优于膨润土。

sentences.english: Modified effect was studied on fresh mortar and hardens mortar with bentonite.
sentences.chinese: 研究了膨润土对新拌砂浆和硬化砂浆的改性效果。

sentences.english: Activated clay is prepared via reation of bentonite and sulfuric acid at high temperature.
sentences.chinese: 活性白土是以膨润土与硫酸经高温反应制成的。

sentences.english: Bentonite ore is a lack mineral in Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 膨润土矿尚属本省缺门矿种。

sentences.english: The bentonite in coal series is very rich.
sentences.chinese: 煤系地层中膨润土储量相当丰富，绝大部分品质优良。

sentences.english: This blocks application of bentonites in practice.
sentences.chinese: 这给膨润土的工业应用带来一定的困难。

sentences.english: The influence of bentonite ratio to green ball properties is not so obvious.
sentences.chinese: 膨润土配入量对氧化镍矿生球性能的影响不明显。

sentences.english: It is capable of being adjusting agent and carrier of fertilizers.
sentences.chinese: 膨润土还可用作肥料的调理剂和载体。

sentences.english: Organic complexes of montmorillonite were prepared by modifying montmorillonite with certain quaternary ammonium.
sentences.chinese: 对无机膨润土进行了聚胺改性，得到有机复合膨润土。

sentences.english: Organic complexes of montmorillonite were prepared by modifying montmorillonite with certain quaternary ammonium.
sentences.chinese: 对无机膨润土进行了聚胺改性，得到有机复合膨润土。

sentences.english: A method for the determination of trace arsenic by atomic fluorescence spectrometry was reported.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一种原子荧光光谱测定膨润土中微量砷的方法。

sentences.english: The flocculating property of chitosan on medicinal bentonite suspension has been investigaeted .
sentences.chinese: 本文报道将壳聚糖用于絮凝药用膨润土悬浊液。

sentences.english: During the synthesis process of titanium oxide pillared bentonite, the calcinations temperature is the most important.
sentences.chinese: 钛柱撑膨润土的制备过程中，煅烧温度至关重要。

sentences.english: A kind of absorbent is made from the combination of chitosan and bentonite.
sentences.chinese: 将壳聚糖与膨润土混合制得一种吸附剂。

sentences.english: The effect of acid-activated bentonite on the properties of color ink-jet printing paper was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了酸化膨润土对彩色喷墨打印纸性能的影响。
